title: A Ray of Hope: A Rayman Story
description: They came from another dimension to create chaos in our own, but one of them wanted more. Watch the rise and struggles of Eden’s most beloved icon.
quote: Maybe because I’m different, I can make a difference.
parent: Captain Laserhawk: A Blood Dragon Remix
altHero: Rayman waving to a crowd at a Hollywood event
alt1: furry alien creatures attacking people in the city
alt2: Rayman on stage at an open mic night
alt3: a mob of protestors holding signs that say, “Aliens go home!”
alt4: Rayman talking to an agent with his hands on a bunch of film reels
